title: Interpretation of a woman in a dream: Seeing my wife in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the wife in a dream with a man without a hijab, caressing the husband, anger between the spouses, seeing the wife adorn herself, seeing the husband with another woman. Interpretation of a dream for the husband about his wife. The husband who sees his wife in a dream shows the extent of his love, affection, and devotion to her, and the wife in a dream shows love, tenderness, and happiness. A husband who sees his wife in a dream as very beautiful, or wearing makeup that makes her a more beautiful and attractive woman, expresses the extent of harmony between the spouses and can foretell happiness and improved living conditions in the future. Just as a wife sees in her dream her husband in the company of another woman, it is possible for the husband to see his wife Also in the company of another man in a dream, and the husband should not allow himself to be controlled by these fantasies and dreams because most of them originate from Satan and I seek refuge in God. The husband seeing his wife with another man in any form indicates the extent of the wife’s love for her husband, her attachment to him, honesty with him, and ease of dealing with him. With him. If his name is Tariq, then this means that he hears the good news, and if his name is Shaker, then this indicates his grace and blessings from God Almighty, and he thanks him for them and so on. A husband sees that his wife is marrying another person in a dream. The meaning of this dream depends on the appearance of the person who is getting married The woman in a dream. However, if he is ugly and his clothes are uncoordinated and torn, then this portends the coming of problems and worries in his home, God forbid. Seeing a woman without a hijab in a dream. The appearance of a woman without a hijab in her husband’s dream symbolizes the emergence of minor disputes between them and may indicate the emergence of family, living or family problems. Lack of money, God forbid. A husband sees his wife sick in a dream. If a husband sees his wife sick or in pain in a dream, this means that in reality she is suffering from psychological problems that are causing her, such as his mistreatment or neglect and lack of attention to her, and the husband must do that. God is considered in his dealings with his wife and performs his duties towards his family. A husband sees his wife’s death in a dream. A husband’s vision that his wife has died in a dream with images of death such as his funeral, a grave, a bad burial, and the deterioration of relations between him and his wife can often lead to separation and divorce, and therefore the husband must That does it. He adjusts his behavior with his wife and changes his style with his wife. The husband may see in his dream that he is looking for his wife but does not find her, and this portends the arrival of problems, fears, and concerns that the husband will not accept, God forbid. Seeing a husband hitting his wife in a dream Seeing a husband hitting his wife without necessity or violence indicates that the wife You will receive a benefit from your husband, which may be a gift. God.The final vision of his ex-wife in a dreamIn the early stages of divorce and separation, it is normal for a man to see his ex-wife in a dream, but seeing his ex-wife in a dream after years means that something will happen or he will hear good news from his ex-wife. . If his ex-wife appears in the dream with an elegant and beautiful appearance... bad or bad news. A widower sees his wife dead in a dream. Also, seeing a dead woman in her husband’s dream immediately after her death is considered normal because it still affects his

title: Interpretation of a dream about incest according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about incest in a dream explained Islamic law and regulated relations between people. Islam allowed marriage and its law to achieve this purpose and protect lineages and offspring from mixing. As for their rights in society, and it made marriage a condition for non-mahrams, it is not permissible for a man to marry his mother, sister, paternal aunt, or paternal aunt, and the like is strictly or temporarily prohibited. Interpretation of a dream about seeing incest in a dream and what are the meanings of seeing adultery. Interpretation of a dream about incest in A dream by Ibn Sirin: A person wants to satisfy his instincts and psychological and physical needs through legitimate and illegitimate methods, and this depends on his morals and the extent of his commitment to the teachings of the Islamic religion. Visions and dreams are often beyond a person’s control, and sometimes they are outside the scope of his thinking. Interpretation of a dream about incest in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A man having sex with his daughter in a dream indicates the emergence of problems between them. The vision may symbolize the outbreak of a crisis between them, especially if The girl at an early age. Ibn Sirin continued to interpret intercourse between brother and sister as a sign of understanding and great agreement between them on earth. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing utensils in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. What is the interpretation of a dream about intercourse? Human nature and the natural sexual instinct are only between husband and wife Anything less than that is rejected, but what happens in the dream does not come from the control and control of the individual. Mixed negatives after waking up, we will explain here what is the interpretation of a dream about incestuous sex: Incest in a dream indicates that the relationship with someone will soon collapse. Among the signs of incest in a dream: lack of love for the dreamer. But contact with a father, grandfather, or sister in a dream is A sign of admiration for the person’s personality. An association with an uncle in a girl’s dream may be a sign of her desire to communicate with someone who resembles the uncle’s personality. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing white clothes in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he committed adultery with his mother. Motherhood is different for children, as she is the teacher, the inspiration, and the teacher. She Who sacrifices everything she has for the comfort of her children. Adultery and intercourse with the mother: When a person sees that he has intercourse with his mother in a dream, this is also met with rejection. The vision showed the mother’s dissatisfaction with the dreamer’s actions and wrong actions. Ibn Shaheen went on to interpret adultery with the mother without lust. It is an indication that the fortuneteller will obtain benefits. May He will have the opportunity to travel abroad. He may reach an important position or a prominent position in society. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing oil in a dream in detail. What is the interpretation of a dream about someone having intercourse with his sister? Prohibiting sexual relations between a man and his sister or any of his first-degree relatives, such as an aunt and uncle. And the grandmother and mother. This prohibition was not limited to the Islamic religion, but rather it was denied and rejected by all divine laws and religions. Some interpreters went to the fact that calling his sister in a dream. He will fall into many arguments and problems with his sister. Perhaps the vision is an indication of imminent improvement. For the relations between them. While seeing intercourse from the same person

title: Interpretation of seeing a friend in a dream Seeing a friend in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about seeing a friend arguing with him, a vision of school friends, a friend, a vision of someone you haven't seen for a long time, Ibn Sirin's friends. Interpretation of a friend in a dream If you are used to seeing your friend in a dream, what this friend says or does in the dream is considered a speech or a discharge of psychological burdens on you, so there is no need to take this dream. If you rarely see your friend in a dream or have never seen him, then in this case you should think about everything this friend says or does in the dream. If what this friend says or does is good or good, it should be taken into account and this dream should be treated as a vision If what this friend does is bad, we should not take it, and this dream is from Satan If you dream of good and happy friends, this means good news for them or that you will see or meet them soon. If you see your friend tired or exhausted, this indicates that he has been afflicted with an illness or a disaster If you see your friends with dark skin, this means an unusual illness for you or them If you see them taking the form of animals, this means that the enemies will separate you from your closest relatives If you see your friend wearing Dark colors with red flames, foretells unpleasant things will happen that will cause you anxiety, if not loss, and that your friends will be anxious about it. If you dream that you see your friend standing like a statue on a hill, it means that you will move to your present position, but you will recall your former impressions of justice and knowledge, and seek them in every change that occurs. If the statue of the friend is low, you will ignore the friends of former days that things will improve in the future. If the statue is at an ordinary level or far from it, you will force yourself to seek change despite the bonds of friendship or love with yourself. If you dream that you see a friend with a white cloth tied over his face, it means that you will be offended by someone who will try to maintain the bond of friendship with you. If you dream that you shake hands with a friend who has offended you, and left you on it with an expression of sadness, this foretells that you will meet with a quarrel with a dear friend, and peace may follow. You will definitely lose someone. A dream about a friend indicates the things that the dreamer hides inside himself and wants to talk about, he is ready to interact with people around him. If you see your friend in a dream and he is in good health, this indicates that he will come to visit you soon. If this friend is very close to you, everyone will bring good news with him, but if he looks sick or frustrated, he is suffering from illness and stress. Seeing a childhood friend in a dream and feeling the desire to sit with him means that the dreamer has recalculated and wants to return his behavior to what it was before, that is, restore the old personality, where the problems were simple. If the dreamer sees in his dream a friend living a happy life and enjoying good health, this foretells that he will sit with him soon and they will spend a good time together. Seeing your old friend in a dream Seeing old friends or childhood friends in a dream indicates that the dreamer feels lonely and

title: Interpretation of a dream about the name Shaima in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the name Shaima in a dream Interpretation of dreams is one of the topics that can be diligent, and many people turn to experts to interpret dreams, and it is one of the religious sciences in which many people try to analyze the truth of the dream to reach it. Conclusion: Dreams are not real dreams because the dream only comes true during sleep. The dream must try to reach its causes and be reassured about it, and through the following lines in the article we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of the name Shaima in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of the name Shaima in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The name Shaima in the dream is considered one of the ancient names known for thousands of years, as it is considered a religious name. If a married man sees the name Shaima in a dream, this portends good things. If an unmarried girl sees the name Shaima in a dream, this indicates that her marriage is approaching or that she will excel in the school stages. If a married woman sees the name Shaima, this indicates happiness and kindness. In the event that she sees People with the name Shaima are indicative of good events. Is the name Shaima lucky? People with this name have a cheerful personality and a sense of humor. They are hardworking and love to work. They hold great senior positions. They hate extravagance, care about their money, and are happy with their marital relationship based on love and understanding. She is also a respectable person, but she is often forced to give up her dignity to continue her life, in addition to being one of the lucky people in her daily life. The name Shaima in a dream for a divorced woman. The interpretation of the name Shaima in a dream shows good luck in life and seeing Shaima in a dream expresses kindness and the name indicates To Islamic religious names. Breastfeeding, so it is preferable to name this name, and the name Shaima is characterized by her love for her home and her husband, and she is a personality that gives everyone love and affection. The meaning of the name Shaima in psychology. Many parents prefer to name authentic Arabic names, which have a clear meaning and common pronunciation, and which are also difficult to pronounce for children and adults. The name Shima in psychology is the girl who has glory, fragrance, pride, and soul. It was said: She is the girl who has moles. In addition to this, she is the name of Al-Harith’s daughter Al-Saadia, the sister of the Messenger of God during breastfeeding. It is worth noting that the dream interpretation of the name Shaima in a dream means a lot of goodness and happiness, whether she is married, divorced, or otherwise.

title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a sweeper in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams in which you see a sweeper in a dream by Al-Nabulsi, and sweeping is a beautiful thing because it is a means of cleanliness and it is an honorable profession for both men and women. Seeing a vacuum cleaner in a married person’s dream indicates that a good wife will help in life. We will tell you the complete interpretation of the interpretation of the dream of seeing a sweeper in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. After that, we continued. Interpretation of dreams to see sweeping in a dream for Nabulsi. Sweeping is a way to remove garbage from a place to make it look better and more beautiful. Seeing yourself sweeping in a dream indicates a change for the better. It is a sign of marriage for single people and pregnancy for married people. Sweeping means success and excellence in study and work. Interpretation Dreaming of seeing a broom in a dream: In a dream, an unmarried man indicates a good wife in the future. Anyone who dreams that he is inspecting him, this is a sign of the fulfillment of dreams, ambitions, and goals. And whoever suffers from problems and dreams that he is emptying them, this is evidence of the loss of worries and the disappearance of differences. Meaning of a dream about buying BroomWhen one dreams of buying a new broom, this indicates a new life. It also indicates removing barriers and removing disputes. A vacuum cleaner means promotion at work and success in studies. Seeing a sweeper in a prisoner’s dream is a sign of freedom and getting out of prison. In a debtor’s dream, this means repayment Religion. The meaning of a dream about sweeping rich people. A rich man who dreams of sweeping the house in a dream is a sign of loss of money and poverty. Anyone who dreams of sweeping garbage is a good sign. A dream about removing dirt indicates the death of evil and the emergence of good. Seeing that he is trying to sweep and failing means that the dreamer has failed in managing His life. A dream about sweeping the mosque, the street, and the stairs. A person’s dream that he is a scavenger indicates improved conditions in society, a decline in prices, and general prosperity. As for sweeping the mosque, it is evidence of the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty and his sincerity in his repentance. Sweeping stairs indicate tolerance and tolerance. Interpretation of a dream about sweeping the street for a divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees that she Sweeping the street, this indicates that she has lost her worries and anxieties. It also indicates the beginning of a new happy life. It also indicates the abundance of food and the abundance of goodness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing sweeping with a broom for a single woman in a dream. If an unmarried woman sees herself cleaning the house with a broom, this is good and indicates the fulfillment of her dreams and desires. It also indicates the right decisions. Sweeping with a broom shows the qualities of a good girl and her patience. Whoever dreams of cleaning his neighbor’s house, this indicates the help of others and the abundance of good deeds. It also indicates the beginning of a new and better life. At the conclusion of this article, we talked to you through the previous lines with information. Sufficient and comprehensive about the above topic, which is the interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s dream of seeing a sweeper in a dream. We wish you dreams full of goodness and happiness as long as you are under God’s care and protection.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake The howling of poisonous reptiles and seeing them in a person’s dream carries many meanings and implications, some of which lead to good, and others indicate anxiety and sadness and express many enemies, and interpreters rely on the interpretation of the events contained in the dream. And the person's condition, and we will show all the details related to seeing the gray snake in this article. Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake The dream of a large gray snake has many meanings and connotations, which are: If the dreamer sees a large gray snake in his dream, this is a sign that he will go through a difficult period of problems and obstacles due to certain people in his life, which will lead to sadness. Seeing a large gray snake in a person's dream indicates a malicious and intrusive woman who is trying to know the details of his life that do not concern her. If a person sees in his dream a large gray snake talking to him kindly, this dream is commendable and indicates that he will receive material spoils and gifts in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many meanings and connotations associated with seeing a large gray snake in a dream, which are: If a person sees a large gray snake in his dream, this vision is not good and leads to the presence of a person from his relatives who hates him very much and bears enmity and hatred towards him. If you see a large gray snake in a man's dream, this means that he will be betrayed and betrayed by the people closest to him. Ibn Sirin also says that if If a person sees a large gray snake in a dream, this is a sign that he is far from God and follows wrong paths and commits obscenities and major sins. Seeing a gray snake in a person’s dream also indicates a lot of family strife. Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake for a single woman If the dreamer is single and sees a large gray snake in his dream, this dream does not bode well and indicates that she will suffer from some health problems. According to Ibn Sirin, if a girl who has never been married sees a large gray snake in her dream, this indicates the presence of a corrupt and malicious young man who is trying to get close to her and harm her reputation. If the virgin is engaged and dreams of a large gray snake, this vision is not good and indicates the dissolution of the engagement. Interpretation of a dream about a light gray snake for a single woman If a separated girl sees a large light gray snake in her bed in a dream, this is a sign that she is suffering from sadness and is exposed to problems and obstacles that hinder her life. Interpretation of a dream about a small gray snake for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a small gray snake that is gray in color, this is a sign that she will receive a strong stab in the back from someone close to her He deceives her and represents her with love. Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake for a married woman If the dreamer is married and sees a large gray snake in her dream, this is an indication that she lives a miserable life in turmoil and conflicts between her and her partner due to the lack of an element of understanding between them in reality. The vision also expresses the presence of competitors between the dreamer’s husband and family. If a woman sees in a dream that

title: The most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin and leading scholars regarding the appearance of the knot in a dream

preview.html: Important interpretations of the appearance of a necklace in a dream and its meaning: The necklace is one of women’s favorite jewelry tools, and there are many materials from which necklaces are made, such as gold, silver, and precious stones. Seeing a necklace in a dream is one of the visions that raises concern for some people, especially if it is lost or stolen, and through the following article each of you will learn about the interpretation of the necklaces of your dreams and their types. An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group of leading translators of dreams and visions in the Arab world. The necklace in a dream. Jurists pointed out The interpretation of a necklace in a dream has many connotations, among which is that if the dreamer sees a necklace wrapped around his neck, this confirms that he is a person who bears many responsibilities. If the dreamer sees that the necklace he wears in the dream has a pendant in the shape of a letter, then this vision explains that the dreamer He never felt tired of responsibility. Because he is by nature a leader. When the dreamer sees in a dream that the necklace he is wearing is a Qur’anic verse, this confirms the dreamer’s passion to obey the orders of God and His Messenger. When the dreamer dreams of a dead person with a necklace around his neck, this is interpreted to mean that this dead person has sinned against the dreamer or one of his relatives and asks them to To forgive him for what he did to them. If the dreamer sees that the necklace on his chest has fallen in a dream, then this dream carries many indicators, including that the dreamer will neglect something important in his life. The dreamer entered into a covenant with someone. This vision expresses a violation of the covenant and promise that existed between the dreamer and one of his acquaintances. Interpretation of a dream about a necklace indicates separation and farewell, especially if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is swimming in water and losing his necklace. Interpretation of a dream about a white knot: seeing the dreamer wearing A white necklace in a dream with a feeling of sadness and depression is evidence of his ability to face all his crises and overcome them easily in the near future. If the dreamer is wearing a white pearl necklace, this indicates that he has many religious qualities such as faith in God. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the necklace in The dream symbolizes memorizing the Book of God by the dreamer, and if the dreamer dreams that he memorizes parts of the Qur’an and wants to seal it by wearing a necklace in his dream, then this dream is good news. That the dreamer completes memorizing the remaining surahs of the Qur’an. What is the interpretation of a silver necklace in a dream? Ibn Sirin interpreted silver in general in a dream and said that it shows the money that the dreamer collects in difficult times. If a single person sees in his dream a piece of metal made of silver, then this The vision interprets that the dreamer will have his share of association with a woman with white skin and a beautiful face. If the dreamer sees in a dream anything made of silver, such as women’s silver utensils and accessories, it is interpreted that the dreamer is an honorable person and that people love him. Because he is able to maintain trust, whether it is money or anything else personal, this vision means that the dreamer will be a source of trust for many people and because of this trust they will put their money and property in his hands without him. He is afraid of him. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the interpretation of a dream about a silver necklace in a woman’s dream indicates that the owner

title: Interpretation of dreams about climbing to a high place

preview.html: And when she saw in her dream that she was standing on a hill and surrounded on all sides by slaughtered cows, this was interpreted as a sign of the emergence of a great epic, and below is a detailed explanation of this dream from our website, it is interpreted.Interpretation of seeing climbing a high place in a dream for a single girl, if she sees An unmarried girl dreams that she is climbing a high place such as a mountain or a hill. This is good news for her about the changes that will happen for the better in her career. The vision may indicate positive actions that this girl takes as a result of her spiritual and mental maturity. When she sees that she was able to rise to the top Then she stayed, as this is a sign of her success in achieving everything she wants to achieve. Also, success in rising to a high position means the marriage of this girl to a wealthy young man who enjoys prestige and power. While an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is climbing to a high position without any hesitation or fear. An indication of her strong will to achieve her ambitions. The vision may express what this woman will achieve in terms of financial and social stability. Since he is sitting in this high place, it is news that he will get married soon. This vision also indicates good management of her life’s affairs and her strong determination. See also: Interpretation Dreaming of climbing a mountain with one person. Interpretation of watching someone climb a high place in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is climbing a high place means that many good things await her. When a married woman sees herself climbing a high place such as a mountain or a hill, this is a sign that she has gained strength. And prestige. This vision may express the height and altitude of her husband and the stability of her husband if he rises and settles in the mountain. Also, if she sees her climbing a high place and then sitting in that place, this may indicate that she will reap a lot of very good food. This vision in a woman’s dream For a married woman, it represents calmness and great happiness that dominate her life, as well as an indicator of the stability of her relationship with her husband. This vision could mean this woman’s high status in her work if she is a worker. Whereas if she is not working, this reflects her husband’s high status in his job. If she rises to A place she does not know, this is an indication of the strength of her determination to overcome the crises she is going through. Interpretation of seeing herself climbing a high place in a dream for a divorced woman: For a divorced woman to see herself climbing a high place and then settling there, this is good news for her soon. This dream also means her marriage to a man who has A high position. It is also an indication of the stability of her life with her new husband. This is compensation from God for the hardships that she went through in her life, and God knows best. Seeing her ascending to a high place also indicates the good and ample nourishment with which her life will be filled. If she sees herself above a high position In a dream, this is a sign of challenges, sadness, and problems that she faces. Seeing a divorced woman looking at a high place expresses the problems that this woman faces, so she prays. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a fall or falling in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of a dream of climbing a high place for a man and its meaningSeeing a man

title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Egypt in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of traveling to Egypt in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing travel to Egypt in a dream means that the dreamer’s anxiety will go away and he will be disturbed, and God knows best. Also, seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream may indicate faith in God Almighty and the dreamer’s repentance from all the sins that he commits. Seeing travel in a dream may indicate that the dreamer’s affairs will be facilitated, as well as the happiness that the dreamer will experience, as well as good news. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Egypt for single women: If an unmarried woman sees in a frivolous dream she sees traveling to Egypt, this indicates the collapse of her worries and her close marriage to A good man, and God knows best. Seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream may indicate facilitating the affairs of an unmarried girl, excellence, and success in her work and in her academic and professional life. Also, seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream could mean that he will not commit immoral acts and sins, as well as joining a new job, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Egypt for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of traveling to Egypt, this indicates the death of her worries and sorrows, as well as the death of marital disputes. Also, the dream of traveling to Egypt indicates the ease of her future circumstances and good news, as well as the presence of happiness in her life. Likewise, the dream of traveling to Egypt indicates the ease of her future circumstances and good news, as well as the presence of happiness in her life. Seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream means that good deeds are coming and you are doing good deeds, and it may indicate a lot of sustenance, and God knows best.Interpretation of seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream for a pregnant womanInterpretation of seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream for a pregnant woman to facilitate her upcoming affairs and repent to God Almighty for All her mistakes. Seeing traveling to Egypt in a dream indicates the happiness of seeing a pregnant woman and doing good deeds, and it may also indicate the ease and imminence of childbirth. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of traveling to Egypt. Interpretation of a divorced woman seeing herself traveling to Egypt and visiting the pyramids, and this is evidence that she is about to end her problems. And returning to her husband. Interpretation of seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream for a man: If a merciful man sees in his dream a vision of traveling to Egypt, this means that the dreamer’s worries will be removed and he will join a new and famous job. Also, seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream may indicate that you are doing charitable work and many Of good deeds, as well as the marriage of a nice person close by. Also, seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream indicates instability and also the death of marital disputes and the arrival of goodness and a lot of happiness. Interpretation of dreams for a trip to Egypt by car. Interpretation of seeing a married woman traveling by car in a dream means that her life will advance in a way Naturally, all her marital problems will end. As a dream of traveling to Egypt at car showrooms, it is a sign of goodness, good circumstances, and the end of many sad things for the pioneer. Interpretation of the dream of traveling by plane to Egypt: The dream of traveling by plane indicates the dreamer’s success and reconciliation in the matters he is going through at this time in his life Also, seeing an airplane traveling to the Arab Republic of Egypt in a dream means renewal in the pioneer’s life and soon getting rid of his obstacles. Interpretation of seeing an Egyptian in a dream.
